The gunfire hitting the ground under which the wormbot stood revealed 
him. He immediately transformed back to robot mode andhopped out of 
his hole. He fired at Inferno's gun as precisely as he could and threw 
his tentacules at the antbot's legs, trying to smash him hard to the 
ground. His eyes were full of fury as he saw that already, SS was 
down, but Warhead was in an even worse condition.

The predacon warrior was lying on his back. Four holes passing through 
him marked where the lasers had burned their way. His agony was still 
lasting, though, and the pain he endured was tremendous. His strength 
effectively vanished, making all attempts to make a sound utterly 
useless. He still lived, but his spark would not stay for long...
